ItemTooltips.sobi_mask: Gives more Mana regen, builds into Orchid of Malevolence.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good HP regen when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Heals you up when you get harassed.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Gives you DPS for killing enemies. Leave these of agility (green) maily.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Allows you to silence enemies and kill them solo.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Get this if you get stunned a lot.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Makes you never miss and gives good DPS. Bashes are also helpful.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Tons of DPS and evasion is good.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Tons of damage and strong crits.
ItemTooltips.manta: Good stats and makes you run faster, illusions are also good.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: Allows for massive damage with searing arrows. Good if you need to push or fight illusions.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Gives great stats and a good slow.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Gives good stats and Mana regen.

AbilityTooltips.clinkz_strafe: Allows you to do tons of damage very fast.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_searing_arrows: Give you great damage through out that game.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_wind_walk: Lets you move around unseen and escape quickly. Watch out for the other team buying invisibility detection. Take one level early just in case.
AbilityTooltips.clinkz_death_pact: Gives you lots of HP and damage, use it often. Also heals you quite well.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: No need to take these until you have to.
